casebody.data:
First Department,

September, 1976

(September 16, 1976) In the Matter of Thomas J. Condon, Appellant, v Michael J. Codd, as Police Commissioner of the New York City Police Department, et al., Respondents.

Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on September 27, 1974, unanimously affirmed on the opinion of Chimera, J., at Special Term, without costs and without disbursements. Concur&emdash;Stevens, P. J., Markewich, Birns and Lane, JJ.
